About Fareeduddin

Hey everyone! I am a Computer Science undergraduate specializing in AI & ML. I assume leadership role as the Head of Technology at CodeWave Hub. With an insatiable curiosity for technology, I thrive on exploring diverse tech domains and continuously acquiring new skills. My proactive engagement in workshops and tech events underscores my dedication to elevating the abilities of my community members. I am a passionate and forward-thinking tech enthusiast, consistently pushing the boundaries of my knowledge and actively contributing to the skill development of those around me.
